nodes.text: Security Hub S-52U was a security station located at the Residential sector on Zakuul. In 3630 BBY Kaliyo Djannis and the Alliance Commander disabled the Security Hub in preparation for their assault on the Overwatch.
Security Hub S-52U appears on Zakuul during "Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise" of the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion.
